Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: எண்ணென்ப ஏனை எழுத்தென்ப இவ்விரண்டும் கண்ணென்ப வாழும் உயிர்க்கு.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: The twain that lore of numbers and of letters give Are eyes, the wise declare, to all on earth that live.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A stylized, wise human face is shown in close-up.
Layered_Composition.Midground: Instead of normal eyes, the left eye is a swirling, intricate vortex of glowing numerals and mathematical symbols (Numbers - 'எண்'). The right eye is a similar vortex of beautiful, flowing ancient Tamil script (Letters - 'எழுத்து').
Layered_Composition.Background: Through these 'eyes' of numbers and letters, the person is perceiving a vast, complex, and beautiful world with perfect clarity, symbolizing understanding.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: The visualization of Numbers and Letters as the two essential eyes for any living being to perceive and understand the world.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The literal replacement of eyes with symbols of numbers and letters is the core metaphor. The clarity of the world seen through them represents the power of education.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: A brilliant, clear light emanates from the two symbolic eyes, illuminating the face. The numbers and letters glow with a vibrant, intelligent blue and gold light.

Technical_Cues.Camera: Extreme close-up on the face, focusing on the symbolic eyes.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, hyper-realistic skin texture contrasted with abstract, glowing symbols.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: Internal lighting from the eyes, creating a unique and powerful visual effect.

Cultural_Anchors: Numbers ('எண்') and Letters ('எழுத்து') as the two eyes of humanity
Fundamental importance of literacy and numeracy

Negative_Prompt: closed eyes, blurry symbols, normal eyes, dark scene, text artifacts, cartoony face.

Hyperparameters.seed: Explore variations for the swirling patterns in the eyes.
